name: Rise of the Dragon King
summary: A long-running campaign about ancient draconic power returning to the realm. The party must uncover the truth behind the disappearance of the last dragon lord and prevent a catastrophic war.

scenes.name: The Ancient Prophecy
scenes.summary: The party discovers an ancient scroll foretelling the return of the Dragon King. They must decipher its meaning before their enemies do.

scenes.name: The First Sign
scenes.summary: Strange phenomena begin occurring across the realm - earthquakes, unusual weather patterns, and sightings of draconic creatures.

scenes.name: Meeting the Oracle
scenes.summary: The party seeks out a reclusive oracle who may hold the key to understanding the prophecy.

storyArcs.name: The Prophecy Arc
storyArcs.summary: Uncovering the truth behind the ancient prophecy and its connection to the Dragon King's return.
